title: Project Actions Configuration
description: Configuration for the Project Actions VS Code extension. Supports JSON5 format (comments, trailing commas).

actions.description: Array of action buttons to display on the status bar

text.description: Button text to display on the status bar. Can include Codicons using $(icon-name) syntax.

command.description: Shell command to execute when the button is clicked. Supports variable substitution like ${file}, ${workspaceFolder}, etc.

tooltip.description: Optional tooltip to display when hovering over the button. Defaults to the command if not specified.

color.description: Optional color for the button text. Can be a hex color code or CSS color name.
